issues.title: Medicare for All
issues.description: Supports universal single-payer healthcare system to provide comprehensive medical coverage for all Americans

issues.title: Green New Deal
issues.description: Advocates for comprehensive climate change legislation with major investments in renewable energy and infrastructure

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports pathway to citizenship for undocumented immigrants, opposes border wall, advocates for comprehensive immigration reform

issues.title: Minimum Wage Increase
issues.description: Supports raising federal minimum wage to $15 per hour, advocates for worker protections and economic justice

issues.title: Student Debt Cancellation
issues.description: Supports federal student loan debt forgiveness and making public higher education tuition-free

issues.title: Criminal Justice Reform
issues.description: Advocates for ending mass incarceration, police reform, and addressing systemic racial inequities in criminal justice system

issues.title: Foreign Policy Reform
issues.description: Critical of military interventions, supports diplomatic solutions, advocates for human rights-centered foreign policy
